name: react-observer-mixin
description: A React.js Mixin with ES5 and ES6-compatible semantics which provides managed event listeners that respect component lifecycles, as well as a state setter which respects React invariants and is suitable for one-time event handlers.

scripts.test: eslint --config eslint.json src/* test/* && istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R spec test/unit/*
scripts.test-and-publish: eslint --config eslint.json src/* test/* && istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R spec test/unit/* && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/codecov.io/bin/codecov.io.js
